## Recalculate Reliability of all scales using Cronbach's Alpha from `psych`

```{r packages}
library(readr)
library(psych)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
```



```{r read-data}
items_per_LLM <- read_csv("processed_data/items_per_LLM.csv")
```



```{r subset-data}
audit_df <- items_per_LLM %>%
  filter(experiment == "AUDIT scale")

audit_wide <- audit_df %>%
  pivot_wider(
    id_cols = c(experiment, model),
    names_from = item,
    values_from = score
  )

audit_wide

```

```{r}
psych::alpha(audit_wide %>% select(-experiment, -model))
```
